item.description:
Join us for a Fall Edition of our Central Square Pub Crawl!  This time we'll change things up a bit - majority of the stops (if not all) have agreed to offer us live entertainment for FREE!  Just because we'll be showing up at their place!  That's cool!

Schedule is as follows:

3:00 p.m. - Middle East CORNER.  Belly Dancers starting at 3!
4:00 p.m. - Phoenix Landing.  Live DJ
5:30 p.m. - Moksa.  Entertainment TBA.
7:00 p.m. - Asgard.  Entertainment TBA.
8:30 p.m. - Middle East CORNER.  Band starts at 9pm.

As always, please maintain your own bar tab and be sure to tip your bartenders!

Feel free to invite your friends along - the more, the merrier!  We will be running a tight ship, so just check the schedule if you cannot meet up with us right at the start.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture and so should you! Just look for the tall guy at the bar.
item.name: Central Square Pub Crawl - Music Edition!
